page.title: 03Horses and Ponies
page.content:
**{Horses and ponies in Egton}**
I am the proud owner of a 12.2 h.h blacky-brown{pony.}She lives out at day and in at night.
There are about{25 ponies and horses in this village and the outlying farms. Most local farms have a pony or a horse.
There is a{pony club}at{Glaisdale, {Lythe, Goathland}and{Robin-Hoods Bay. They have quite a large membership and the best one is supposed to be {Goathland.
There are lots of horses and ponies at {Egton show}with classes such as "Tack and Turn-out" and Jumping. There is always a raffle for a pony and I go in for it. By Jenefer Hall
